Summaries.eng: Follows several young women who each do their utmost to seduce their senpai.
Summaries.jpn: それぞれが先輩を誘惑するために全力を尽くす数人の若い女性をフォローします。

Titles.eng: The Coworker is Suffering from Social Inequality
Titles.jpn: 格差社会に悩む会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Unaired episode 13 included with the Blu-ray release of Ganbare Douki-chan.

Titles.eng: Due To A Mix-up At The Hotel, Two Coworkers End Up Sharing A Room On A Business Trip
Titles.jpn: 出張先のホテルの手違いで、相部屋になってしまった会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan tries to take advantage of the mix-up on a business trip to seduce a coworker she likes.

Titles.eng: My coworker and I were in the elevator together and then we were trapped inside together
Titles.jpn: エレベーターに一緒に乗ったら、閉じ込められてしまった会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan and the coworker she likes are trapped in the elevator together. Can she use this opportunity to get closer to him?

Titles.eng: The Junior Who Gives Chocolate On Valentine's Day At Work
Titles.jpn: バレンタインデーに、職場でチョコを渡す会社の後輩

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan makes chocolates for the coworker she likes, but her Junior steals him away.

Titles.eng: My Coworker Who Came Back To Pick Up What He Left Behind
Titles.jpn: 忘れ物を取りに戻った会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Douki-kun comes back to the restaurant and sees that Douki-chan has fallen asleep. He helps her get home, and then...?

Titles.eng: A Coworker Who Was Looking Forward To A White Day Gift...
Titles.jpn: ホワイトデーに期待していた会社の同期…

Summaries.eng: March 14th is White Day, when men who received chocolates on Valentine's Day are supposed to give back thank-you gifts. Douki-chan is hopeful that she'll get one from Douki-kun.

Titles.eng: My Coworker Who Received An Embarrassing Selfie
Titles.jpn: 恥ずかしい写真を送られてしまった会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan accidentally sends her cosplay selfie to Douki-kun. Out of embarrassment, she calls in sick. But she gets this weird feeling and decides to go to work.

Titles.eng: A Coworker Who Goes All-Out With Seductive Lingerie
Titles.jpn: 勝負下着で今日に懸ける会社の同期

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan puts on the best lingerie to tell Douki-kun how she really feels. However, another unexpected rival shows up.

Titles.eng: They Clash!! The Junior Coworker VS The Business Client Senpai!
Titles.jpn: 激突!!会社の後輩vs取引先の先輩

Summaries.eng: Dinner with Douki-kun has now turned into drinking with Douki-chan's rivals. But Douki-kun pulls her aside to be alone with her.

Titles.jpn: 何も知らずに寝ている会社の同期

Summaries.eng: The day is breaking, and our heroine wakes up naked in her bed! What could have happened the night she was about to declare her feelings to our hero?

Titles.eng: A Coworker Who's Excited About A Poolside Date
Titles.jpn: プールデートと浮かれる会社の同期

Summaries.eng: One of the office colleagues is looking for someone to accompany her to the pool, so she decides to invite our two protagonists.

Titles.eng: It Finally Bears Fruit!! Good For You, Douki-Chan
Titles.jpn: ついに実る!!よかったね、同期ちゃん

Summaries.eng: Douki-chan and Douki-kun are at a wedding, and some guys hit on Douki-chan.

Titles.eng: That's What I'm Talking About, Douki-Kun
Titles.jpn: そういうとこだぞ、同期くん

Summaries.eng: At a wedding party, the colleague is hoping to get attention from her crush again. But when she suddenly had to cosplay again, this wish was immediately gone...
